ratings.comment: Professor Ward is my favorite professor. Every time you're sitting in her lectures, you enter a safe space. Her lectures are amazing, and she interacts with her students. She's down to earth, and that helped so much when learning material for this class. As long as you show up to class and do the modules, you will be okay. She's a great professor!

Dr. Ward created one of the most supportive and empowering learning environments in this class. All the subjects covered were relevant and the homework was easy. She was incredibly knowledgeable and caring about her students and made her lectures interactive and fun. This course will be sticking with me, I could not recommend it enough.
I love Dr. Ward. She is very knowledgable, caring, and a great lecturer. Each module was very reading intensive, prepare to read a lot each week to do well on quizzes.
Interesting prof, loved having her for gws 103! Easy A, but also super interesting class.
